tool_description: The Weibo hot search rankings are updated every half hour, showing the latest headlines that Chinese people are most concerned about.
name: Top trending topics on Weibo(china twiter)
title: Top trending topics on Weibo(china twiter)
tool_name: Top trending topics on Weibo(china twiter)

api_list.name: get wei bo hot news list
api_list.description: this api will get the weibo top news .
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://top-trending-topics-on-weibo-china-twiter.p.rapidapi.com/api/kn/weibo/top/10"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-trending-topics-on-weibo-china-twiter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://top-trending-topics-on-weibo-china-twiter.p.rapidapi.com/api/kn/weibo/top/10"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "top-trending-topics-on-weibo-china-twiter.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
